types:type.name: jsoninput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type jsoninput = {| empId: String, empName: String, empsal: String, emploc: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empId\\\":\\\"100\\\",\\\"empName\\\":\\\"Akshitha\\\",\\\"empsal\\\":\\\"20000\\\",\\\"emploc\\\":\\\"india\\\"}"}

types:type.name: csvType
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type csvType = Array<{| eid: String, ename: String, esal: Number, eloc: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: jsonarrayinput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type jsonarrayinput = Array<{| empId: String, emName: String, empsal: String, emploc: String, empName: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"empId\\\":\\\"100\\\",\\\"emName\\\":\\\"Akshitha\\\",\\\"empsal\\\":\\\"20000\\\",\\\"emploc\\\":\\\"india\\\"},{\\\"empId\\\":\\\"200\\\",\\\"empName\\\":\\\"Akshi\\\",\\\"empsal\\\":\\\"30000\\\",\\\"emploc\\\":\\\"india\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: jsonarray
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type jsonarray = Array<{| empId: String, empName: String, empsal: String, emploc: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"empId\\\":\\\"100\\\",\\\"empName\\\":\\\"Akshitha\\\",\\\"empsal\\\":\\\"20000\\\",\\\"emploc\\\":\\\"india\\\"},{\\\"empId\\\":\\\"200\\\",\\\"empName\\\":\\\"Akshi\\\",\\\"empsal\\\":\\\"30000\\\",\\\"emploc\\\":\\\"india\\\"}]"}
